participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate, with a strong connection to nature and family.
participant_1.background: I can't wait to get home and tend to my greenhouse after the concert tonight. I work as an online tutor during the hours that I am awake. I enjoy spending my time with my two beagles, Chance and Boomer. I enjoy driving my classic car along the winding roads near my lake house. I'm kind of a rebellious person, but I also love my dad.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Determined and creative, with a passion for art and a laid-back attitude.
participant_2.background: I am moving because my job at the pizza parlor is not giving me enough money. After I go for a run, my head is cleared and I am ready to create more websites. I get to make gummy worms all day long, which is a dream come true for me! I rent my apartment because I have ink stains on all my shirts. I can draw.

content.text: I'm doing okay! I'm a bit stressed out about moving, but I'm excited for a new start.
That's exciting! What are you most excited about in your new place?
I'm excited to have a bigger space for my gummy worm production! I'll be able to make so many more!
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll make a killing.
Thanks! I hope so! I'm also excited to be closer to the lake.
That's great! I love the lake. I like to go for walks around it and take pictures.
That's sounds nice! I'm not much of a nature person, but I can appreciate the beauty of it.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to draw! I also like to run and play video games.
Drawing is cool! I've always wanted to learn how to draw.
It's not too hard! You just have to practice a lot.
I guess I could give it a try.
